aztecs: Infantry and Monk civilization • Villagers carry +3 • Military units created 11% faster • +5 Monk HP for each Monastery technology • Start with +50 gold UU: Jaguar Warrior (infantry) UTs: • Atlatl (Skirmishers +1 attack, +1 range) • Garland Wars (+4 infantry attack) TB: Relics generate +33% gold
berbers: Cavalry and Naval civilization • Villagers move 10% faster • Stable units cost -15% in Castle, -20% in Imperial Age • Ships move 10% faster UUs: Camel Archer (cavalry archer), Genitour (mounted skirmisher) UTs: • Kasbah (team castles work 25% faster) • Maghrebi Camels (Camel units regenerate) TB: Genitour available in the Archery Range starting in the Castle Age
britons: Foot Archer civilization • TCs cost -50% wood starting in the Castle Age • Foot archers (except skirmishers) +1 range in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total) • Shepherds work 25% faster UU: Longbowman (archer) UTs: • Yeomen (+1 foot archer range +2 tower attack) • Warwolf (Trebuchets do blast damage) TB: Archery Ranges work 20% faster
bulgarians: Infantry and Cavalry civilization • Militia-line upgrades free • TCs cost -50% stone starting in the Castle Age • Blacksmith and Siege Workshop technologies cost -50% food • Can build Krepost UU: Konnik (cavalry) UTs: • Stirrups (Cavalry attack 33% faster) • Bagains (Militia-line gains +5 armor) TB: Blacksmiths work 80% faster
burmese: Monk and Elephant civilization • Lumber Camp upgrades free • Infantry +1 attack per age (starting in the Feudal Age) • Monastery technologies cost -50% UU: Arambai (ranged cavalry) UTs: • Howdah (Battle Elephants +1/+1P armor) • Manipur Cavalry (Cavalry and Arambai +6 attack vs. buildings) TB: Relics visible on the map at the start of the game
byzantines: Defensive civilization • Buildings +10% HPs Dark, +20% Feudal, +30% Castle, +40% Imperial Age • Camel Riders, Skirmishers, Pikemen, Halberdiers cost -25% • Fire ships attack 25% faster • Advance to Imperial Age costs -33% • Town Watch free UU: Cataphract (cavalry) UTs: • Greek Fire (Fire Ships +1 range) • Logistica (Cataphracts cause trample damage) TB: Monks +50% heal speed
celts: Infantry and Siege civilization • Infantry move 15% faster (starting in the Feudal Age) • Lumberjacks work 15% faster • Siege weapons fire 25% faster • Can steal sheep, and sheep within one Celt unit's LOS cannot be stolen UU: Woad Raider (infantry, sexiest unit in the game) UTs: • Stronghold (Castles and towers fire 25% faster) • Furor Celtica (Siege +40% HP) TB: Siege Workshops work 20% faster
chinese: Archer civilization • Start with +3 villagers, -50 wood, -200 food • Technologies cost -10% Feudal, -15% Castle, -20% Imperial Age • TCs support 10 population and +5 LOS • Demolition ships +50% HP UU: Chu Ko Nu (archer) UTs: • Great Wall (Walls and towers +30% HP) • Rocketry (Chu Ko Nu +2, scorpions +4 attack) TB: Farms +45 food
cumans: Cavalry civilization • +1 TC can be built in the Feudal Age • Siege Workshop and Ram available in the Feudal Age; Capped Ram available in Castle Age • Cavalry 5% faster each age (starting in Feudal Age) UU: Kipchak (cavalry archer) UTs: • Steppe Husbandry (Light Cavalry, Steppe Lancers and Cavalry Archers trained 100% faster) • Cuman Mercenaries (10 free Kipchaks) TB: Palisade Walls +50% HP
ethiopians: Archer civilization • Archers fire 18% faster • Receive +100 gold, +100 food when advancing to the next age • Pikeman upgrade free UU: Shotel Warrior (infantry) UTs: • Royal Heirs (Shotel Warriors train nearly instantly) • Torsion Engines (increases blast radius of Siege Workshop units) TB: Towers and Outposts +3 LOS
franks: Cavalry civilization • Castles cost -25% • Cavalry +20% HP starting in Feudal Age • Farm upgrades free (require Mill) • Foragers work 25% faster UU: Throwing Axeman (infantry) UTs: • Chivalry (Stables work 40% faster) • Bearded Axe (+1 Throwing Axemen range) TB: Knights +2 LOS
goths: Infantry civilization • Infantry cost -20%/-25%/-30%/-35% • Infantry +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting from Feudal Age) • Villagers +5 attack vs. wild boar; hunters carry +15 meat • Loom can be researched instantly • +10 population in Imperial Age UU: Huskarl (infantry) UTs: • Anarchy (create Huskarls at Barracks) • Perfusion (Barracks work 100% faster) TB: Barracks work 20% faster
huns: Cavalry civilization • Do not need houses, but start with -100 wood • Cavalry Archers cost -10% Castle, -20% Imperial Age • Trebuchets +30% accuracy UU: Tarkan (cavalry) UTs: • Marauders (Create Tarkans at stables) • Atheism (+100 years Relic, Wonder victories Spies/Treason costs -50%) TB: Stables work 20% faster
incas: Infantry civilization • Start with a free Llama • Villagers affected by Blacksmith upgrades • Houses support 10 population • Buildings cost -15% stone UUs: Kamayuk (infantry), Slinger (archer) UTs: • Andean Sling (Skirmishers and Slingers no minimum range) • Fabric Shields (Kamayuks, Slingers, Eagles +1/+2P armor) TB: Farms built 100% faster
indians: Camel and Gunpowder civilization • Villagers cost -10% Dark, -15% Feudal, -20% Castle, -25% Imperial Age • Fishermen work 10% faster • Stable units +1P armor in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total) UUs: Elephant Archer (cavalry archer), Imperial Camel Rider (camel rider) UTs: • Sultans (All gold income 10% faster) • Shatagni (Hand Cannoneers +1 range) TB: Camel units +4 attack vs. buildings
italians: Archer and Naval civilization • Advancing to the next age costs -15% • Dock technologies cost -50% • Fishing Ships cost -15% • Gunpowder units cost -20% UUs: Genoese Crossbowman (archer), Condottiero (infantry) UTs: • Pavise (foot archers and Condottieri +1 armor/+1 pierce armor) • Silk Road (trade units cost -50%) TB: Condottiero available in the Barracks in Imperial Age
japanese: Infantry civilization • Fishing Ships 2x HP; +2P armor; work rate +5% Dark, +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age • Mill, Lumber/Mining Camps cost -50% • Infantry attack 33% faster starting in Feudal Age UU: Samurai (infantry) UTs: • Yasama (Towers shoot extra arrows) • Kataparuto (Trebuchets fire, pack faster) TB: Galleys +50% LOS
khmer: Siege and Elephant civilization • No prerequisites needed • Farmers drop food directly • Battle Elephants move 10% faster • Villagers can garrison in Houses UU: Ballista Elephant (mounted scorpion) UTs: • Tusk Swords (Battle Elephants +3 attack) • Double Crossbow (Ballista Elephants and Scorpions fire two projectiles) TB: Scorpions +1 range
koreans: Defensive and Naval civilization • Villagers +3 LOS • Stone miners 20% faster • Tower upgrades free (Bombard Tower requires Chemistry) • Archer armor upgrades free • Military units (except siege) cost -20% wood UUs: War Wagon (cavalry archer), Turtle Ship UTs: • Eupseong (Watch Towers, Guard Towers and Keeps +2 range) • Shinkichon (Mangonel-line +1 range) TB: Mangonel-line minimum range reduced
lithuanians: Cavalry and Monk civilization • Start with +150 food • Spearman-line and Skirmishers move 10% faster • Each garrisoned relic gives +1 attack to Knights and Leitis (maximum +4) UU: Leitis (cavalry) UTs: • Hill Forts (TCs +3 range) • Tower Shields (Spearman-line and Skirmishers +2P armor) TB: Monasteries work 20% faster
magyars: Cavalry civilization • Villagers kill wolves with 1 strike • Forging, Iron Casting, Blast Furnace free • Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar cost -15% UU: Magyar Huszar (cavalry) UTs: • Corvinian Army (Magyar Huszars cost no gold) • Recurve Bow (Cavalry archers +1 range, +1 attack) TB: Foot archers +2 LOS
malay: Naval civilization • Advancing to the next age 66% faster • Fish Traps cost -33% • Fish Traps provide unlimited food • Battle Elephants 30% cheaper UU: Karambit Warrior (infantry) UTs: • Thalassocracy (upgrades Docks to Harbors, which fire arrows) • Forced Levy (Militia-line gold cost is replaced by additional food cost) TB: Docks +100% LOS
malians: Infantry civilization • Buildings cost -15% wood • Barracks units +1P armor per age (starting from Feudal Age) • Gold Mining free UU: Gbeto (infantry) UTs: • Tigui (TCs fire arrows when ungarrisoned) • Farimba (Cavalry +5 attack) TB: Universities work 80% faster
mayans: Archer civilization • Start with +1 villager, but -50 food • Resources last 15% longer • Archers cost -10% Feudal, -20% Castle, -30% Imperial Age UU: Plumed Archer (archer) UTs: • Obsidian Arrows (Archers, Crossbowmen and Arbalesters +6 attack vs. buildings) • El Dorado (Eagle Warriors have +40 HP) TB: Walls cost -50%
mongols: Cavalry Archer civilization • Cavalry archers fire 25% faster • Light Cavalry, Hussars, Steppe Lancers +30% HP • Hunters work 40% faster UU: Mangudai (cavalry archer) UTs: • Nomads (LOSt houses do not decrease population headroom) • Drill (Siege Workshop units move 50% faster) TB: Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar +2 LOS
persians: Cavalry civilization • Start with +50 wood, food • TC, Dock 2x HP; work rate +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age UU: War Elephant (cavalry) UTs: • Kamandaran (Archer-line gold cost is replaced by additional wood cost) • Mahouts (War Elephants 30% faster) TB: Knights +2 attack vs. Archers
portuguese: Naval and Gunpowder civilization • All units cost -20% gold • Technologies researched 30% faster • Ships +10% HP • Can build Feitoria in Imperial Age UUs: Organ Gun (siege), Caravel (war ship) UTs: • Carrack (Ships +1/+1 armor) • Arquebus (gunpowder units more accurate) TB: LOS is shared with the team starting in the Dark Age
saracens: Camel and Naval civilization • Market trade cost only 5% • Market costs -100 wood • Transport Ships 2x HP, 2x capacity • Galleys attack 25% faster • Archers (except skirmishers) +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting in the Feudal Age) UU: Mameluke (camel rider) UTs: • Madrasah (Monks return 33% of their cost when killed) • Zealotry (Camel units +30 HP) TB: Foot archers +1 attack vs. buildings
slavs: Infantry and Siege civilization • Farmers work 10% faster • Supplies free • Siege Workshop units 15% cheaper UU: Boyar (cavalry) UTs: • Orthodoxy (Monks +3/+3P armor) • Druzhina (Infantry damage adjacent units) TB: Military buildings provide +5 population room
spanish: Gunpowder and Monk civilization • Builders work 30% faster • Blacksmith upgrades don't cost gold • Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (fire faster, more accurately) • Gunpowder units fire 18% faster UUs: Conquistador (mounted hand cannoneer), Missionary (mounted Monk) UTs: • Inquisition (Monks convert faster) • Supremacy (Villagers stronger in combat) TB: Trade units generate +25% gold
tatars: Cavalry Archer civilization • +50% food from sheep • +2 sheep each age • +25% downhill bonus • Thumb Ring, Parthian Tactics free UUs: Keshik (raiding cavalry), Flaming Camel (petard) UTs: • Silk Armor (Light Cavalry, Steppe Lancers and Cavalry Archers receive +1/+1P armor) • Timurid Siegecraft (Trebuchets +2 range, enables Flaming Camels) TB: Cavalry Archers +2 LOS
teutons: Infantry civilization • Monks healing range 2x • Towers garrison 2x units • Murder Holes, Herbal Medicine free • Farms cost -40% • TC garrison +10 • Barracks and Stable units +1 armor in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total) UU: Teutonic Knight (infantry) UTs: • Ironclad (siege weapons extra melee armor) • Crenellations (+3 range Castles garrisoned infantry fire arrows) TB: Units resist conversion
turks: Gunpowder civilization • Gunpowder units +25% HP; researching gunpowder technologies costs -50%; Chemistry free • Gold miners 20% faster • Scout Cavalry-line +1P armor • Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades free UU: Janissary (hand cannoneer) UTs: • Sipahi (Cavalry Archers +20 HP) • Artillery (+2 range Bombard Towers, Bombard Cannons, Cannon Galleons) TB: Gunpowder units created 25% faster
vietnamese: Archer civilization • Enemy positions are revealed at the start of the game • Economic upgrades cost no wood • Archery Range units +20% HP • Conscription free UUs: Rattan Archer (foot archer) UTs: • Chatras (Battle Elephants +50 HP) • Paper Money (Each team member receives 500 gold) TB: Imperial Skirmisher upgrade available in the Imperial Age
vikings: Infantry and Naval civilization • Warships cost -15% Feudal Age, -15% Castle Age, -20% Imperial Age • Infantry +10% HP Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age • Wheelbarrow, Hand Cart free UUs: Berserk (infantry), Longboat (warship) UTs: • Chieftains (infantry deal bonus damage to cavalry) • Berserkergang (Berserks regenerate faster) TB: Docks cost -15%
